title: 104_hr2365
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for contributions made by an individual who is younger than the age of 40 to an individual retirement plan designated as a Retirement Years Savings Account (RYS). Prohibits any rollover contribution to an RYS account unless: (1) such contribution is from another RYS account. Or (2) such contribution is from another individual retirement plan and is made before January 1998.
